::Unknown::

"I was recently awakened from stasis by some clown named Photo=
nis.  He
promised me a ride, but never gave me one.  I think he also tamper=
ed
with my programming, I have suffered memory loss.  I still have a very
s=
tong urge to kill both of you... However, if you can provided me with
more =
enemies, then I will gladly go with you."

He said, now facing Hydras, star=
ing intently.

::Rodimus::

Rodimus sat down next to Nightlight, getting up=
 occasionally to make
sure that they were not followed.

Rodimus: They are =
on their way to pick us up now.  Now we just need to
hold out until they ge=
t here.
